record.name: Tick
record.description: The Tick record defines how tick marks and label positioning/formatting
record.author: Andrew C. Oliver(acoliver at apache.org)

field.name: major tick type
field.description: type of major tick mark 0 (none),1 (inside axis line), 2 (outside axis line), 3 (cross axis line)

field.name: minor tick type
field.description: type of minor tick mark 0 (none),1 (inside axis line), 2 (outside axis line), 3 (cross axis line)

field.name: label position
field.decription: label position relative to the axis line 0=invisible, 1=low end,2=high end, 3=next to axis

field.name: label color rgb
field.description: an RGB value of the label text where highbyte=0

bit.name: auto text color
bit.description: use the quote unquote automatic color for text

bit.name: auto text background
bit.description: use the quote unquote automatic color for text background

bit.name: rotation
bit.description: rotate text (0=none, 1=normal, 2=90 degrees counterclockwise, 3=90 degrees clockwise)
